events.name: InventoryAdded
events.description: Track addition of new inventory items.

events.name: InventoryUpdated
events.description: Capture updates to existing inventory details.

events.name: InventoryRemoved
events.description: Log the removal of inventory items from stock.

events.name: InventoryChecked
events.description: Check current inventory status and levels.

events.name: InventoryReplenished
events.description: Trigger replenishment orders when stock is low.

commands.name: AddInventoryItem
commands.description: Track addition of new inventory items.

commands.name: UpdateInventoryItem
commands.description: Capture updates to existing inventory details.

commands.name: RemoveInventoryItem
commands.description: Log the removal of inventory items from stock.

commands.name: CheckInventoryStatus
commands.description: Check current inventory status and levels.

commands.name: ReplenishInventory
commands.description: Trigger replenishment orders when stock is low.

integrationPoints.name: OrderingSystem
integrationPoints.description: Integration needed to manage stock levels based on orders.

integrationPoints.name: SalesSystem
integrationPoints.description: Sync inventory levels with sales transactions.

integrationPoints.name: AccountingSystem
integrationPoints.description: Update financial records based on inventory changes.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagement
integrationPoints.description: Access supplier information for restocking inventory.
